sentence.Network_en: Uncleanliness is the root of various diseases.
sentence.Network_cn: 不注意清洁是各种疾病的根源.

sentence.Network_en: Cleanliness: Tolerate no uncleanliness in body, clothes, or habitation.
sentence.Network_cn: 整洁: 身体 、 衣物和住处都应保持整洁.

sentence.Network_en: Cleanliness: Tolerate no uncleanliness in body, cloths, or habitation.
sentence.Network_cn: 清洁: 身体 、 衣着和居所要力求清洁.

auth_sentence.content: The worst thing about them is their uncleanliness.
